body.p: Chrysanthemumsflowersautumnchrysanthemums, often called 'mums', are a genus (Chrysanthemum) of about 30 species of perennial flowering plants in the family Asteraceae, native to Asia and northeastern Europe.

Region Covered
The Federal Reserve Bank of Boston is the First Federal Reserve District and has regulatory Jurisdiction over Maine, Massachusetts, New Hampshire, Rhode Island, Vermont and all of Connecticut, except Fairfield County.
